attributes.action: stop the Bolton Toan Centre Ambassadors being shut down by Bolton Council.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TheAmbassadors were set up in 1999 to assist the town centre in the prevention of crime, assist the public (first aids, directions etc.) reporting of fly tipping, fly posting, and graffiti, as well as reporting of any problems to the highway dept., Day and night. Bolton Council took over in 2008 and are now getting rid of them due to lack of funds. Why???

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
